pageContext.claim: “The [Atlantic] story is a hoax, written by a guy who has got a tremendously bad history. The magazine itself -- which I don't read, but I hear it's just totally anti-Trump; he's a big Obama person, he's a big Clinton person. And he made up the story. It's a totally made-up story.”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no indication that the story is a “hoax” or inaccurate. There have not been any corrections applied to the story.
